creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: Names of characters written aside each person: right: {Kinsho_jo} | middle: {Enpeio_ Kokusenya} | left: [??gun] {Kanki}
markings: red artist\'s toshidama seal (R) | on each sheet, censor seals: {Hama} | {Magome} | publisher\'s seal: {Yama-hisa} [unknown, on each]
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: R:  一陽齋豊國 {Ichiyōsai Toyokuni} | in toshidama cartouche, L, C: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play Kokusen'ya kassen, performed at the Nakamura Theater, 1850, 5th month.
title: Actors Bandō Shūka I as Kinshōjo (R), Ichikawa Danjūrō VII as Kokusen'ya (C), and Ichikawa Ebizō V as Gojōgun Kanki (L)
